nav.div: Granite Falls School District » Departments » Health Services » CoronaVirus » Technology Support

div.span: The Granite Falls School District believes in supplying as many supports as possible to make sure that all of our students and staff are successful during this transition into a temporary e-learning environment. Below you will find helpful tools to assist in trouble shooting.

br.span: This page is dedicated to providing general technology information and guidance.

div.div:
In need of a Chromebook? Fill out a Technology Equipment Agreement Form.
If you have questions or need assistance, please contact your building secretary via phone or email and allow 48 hours for a response. If you are still unable to receive help email chromebooks@gfalls.wednet.edu.
